snippet: As the United States sees record-low birthrates, some lament a new form of social organization that prizes liberation, personal happiness and perhaps even a "hip" urban aesthetic over traditional values like community and self-sacrifice.
abstract: As the United States sees record-low birthrates, some lament a new form of social organization that prizes liberation, personal happiness and perhaps even a "hip" urban aesthetic over traditional values like community and self-sacrifice.

headline.main: Are Women Having Fewer Children to Have More Fun?
